statements: DELETE FROM voter_registration WHERE voter_name = 'Alice' AND voter_age > 25;
DELETE FROM voter_registration WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01' AND voter_age <= 18;
DELETE FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 1001 AND last_name = 'Smith';
DELETE FROM voter_history WHERE voting_frequency < 5 AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM VoterHistory WHERE history_id = 500 AND action_taken = 'Address Update';
DELETE FROM voter_addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM VoterDetails WHERE voter_id = 123456789 AND age > 18
